name: Seven Floors (2020)
description:
Oblivious, Seven woke up at the top of a tower without knowing exactly where or who he was. As he tried to escape, he learned more about himself and why he was in this tower in the first place. However, it wasn't going to be as easy as it seems. Seven, a cyborg with limited resources and abilities, must find a way to get out of the tower by clearing puzzles while escaping from The Cleaner, a cyborg that will chase Seven wherever he goes.

-----------------------------------------------

Single-player Horror FPS Game with a dash of Puzzle. Waking up in an unknown experiment tower, Seven, a cyborg with limited resources and abilities, decided to break free and escape. However, it's not as easy as it seems.

Team:
Myself (Game Designer - Level & Sound Artist & Programmer)
Helmika Mahendra P (Game Designer - Combat & 3D Modeller/Animator & Programmer)
M Rasyid Ulwan (3D Modeller/Animator)
